name: Bitmap Manipulator
description: A python app that edits and compresses images featuring a guided user interface. The user has the option to change brightness and size, as well as remove RGB colour channels. The lossless compression feature employs a custom LZW encoding algorithm.

0.alt: A screenshot of two instances of the bitmap manipulator app. On the left is the original image. On the right is the same image resized to 32 percent. No other changes are made.

1.alt: A screenshot of two instances of the bitmap manipulator app. On the left is the original image. On the right is the same image with brightness reduced to 10 percent and the red colour channel removed. No other changes are made.

2.alt: A screenshot of two instances of the bitmap manipulator app. On the left is the original image. On the right is a screen showing the details of compressing the original image. A compression ratio of 3.06 was achieved in 3.0 seconds.
